description:
- Revamped the entire bassline; should 99% perfect now (to my ears)
- Made drums readable
- Cleaned up rests
- Corrected track names; credited musicians
- Adjusted track volumes
- Changed vocal instruments
- Added hammer-ons/pull-offs to triplets in the rhythm guitar part
- Changed the G to a G# in the pickup to verse 3 (measure 66)
title: Rock And Roll Band

description: Fixed bass line during chorus, which was oversimplified, and transcribed this note-by-note from the original.  Might still need some work towards the outro.
title: Rock And Roll Band
